    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       The Politics of Memory &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>
    <div class="guideattr" id="guideattr">
     <span id="lastupdate" class="lastupdate">
      Last Updated: Aug 17, 2016
     </span>
     <span class="guideurl">
      URL: http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/politicsmemory
     </span>

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17365608">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17365608">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17365608">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17365608">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
           IM (AIM, Yahoo): refcannon
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17365608" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17365609">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17365609">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17365609">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17365609">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           <span>
            &nbsp;buttons
           </span>
           &nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17365609" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17365610">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17365610">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17365610">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference works
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17365610">
          <div id="boxatt17365610" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20442744">
              <a id="link_20442744" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20442744,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'The Politics of Memory', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12327125}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               An online collection of well-known reference books, available by library subscription.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20442746">
              <a id="link_20442746" href="http://plato.stanford.edu/about.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20442746,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'The Politics of Memory', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12730296}); ">
               Stanford Encyclopedia of Philosophy
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Peer-reviewed open-access encyclopedia. Compare/contrast with the Internet Encyclopedia of Philosophy listed above, as well as non-scholarly resources like SparkNotes and Wikipedia (not recommended for use with this project).
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17365611">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17365611">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17365611">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Scholarly books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17365611">
          <div id="boxatt17365611" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link22403439">
              <a id="link_22403439" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22403439,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'The Politics of Memory', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17365612">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17365612">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17365612">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Scholarly Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17365612">
          <div id="boxatt17365612" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20442749">
              <a id="link_20442749" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20442749,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'The Politics of Memory', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12335038}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Good starting place for journals from every discipline. Includes the full text of about 3000 journals. Limit to "peer reviewed" to find only scholarly articles. Back issues of journals begin as early as 1990. Recent issues may not be included yet, due to publisher agreement. Journals held in Trexler Library are marked accordingly.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20442750">
              <a id="link_20442750" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20442750,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'The Politics of Memory', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12364481}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Archive (five year old and prior) of scholarly journals across the disciplines.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20442753">
              <a id="link_20442753" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=phl" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20442753,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'The Politics of Memory', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12730094}); ">
               Philosopher's Index
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available through library subscription. Standard journal database in philosophy.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20442754">
              <a id="link_20442754" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=psyh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20442754,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'The Politics of Memory', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12326504}); ">
               PsycINFO
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database for psychology.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17365615">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17365615">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17365615">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Search engines
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17365615">
          <div id="boxatt17365615" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20442758">
              <a id="link_20442758" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20442758,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'The Politics of Memory', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20016760}); ">
               Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Non-selective. One of the largest web crawlers.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>

     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4712951" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17365616">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17365616">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17365616">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Creating a bibliography
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17365616">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            Zotero
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17365616" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17365617">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17365617">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17365617">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17365617">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17365617" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
